committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To eliminate the safe-harbor exception for certain packaged pseudoephedrine products used in the manufacture of methamphetamine.
short_title: Methamphetamine Blister Pack Loophole Elimination Act of 2004

summary.text: Methamphetamine Blister Pack Loophole Elimination Act of 2004 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to eliminate the exemption as a "regulated transaction" for any sale of ordinary over-the-counter pseudoephedrine or phenylpropanolamine products (including blister packs) by retail distributors.

titles.title: Methamphetamine Blister Pack Loophole Elimination Act of 2004
To eliminate the safe-harbor exception for certain packaged pseudoephedrine products used in the manufacture of methamphetamine.
